name: nativescript-couchbase
description: Couchbase Lite plugin for Telerik NativeScript

scripts.configure: echo "Configuring..."; npm run configure-vanilla; npm run configure-angular;
scripts.configure-vanilla: echo "Configuring Vanilla..."; cd demo; tns install; tns plugin remove nativescript-couchbase; tns plugin add ..; cd ..
scripts.configure-angular: echo "Configuring Angular..."; cd ng-demo; tns install; tns plugin remove nativescript-couchbase; tns plugin add ..; cd ..
scripts.deploy-android-angular: echo "Deploying Android Angular..."; npm run configure-angular; cd ng-demo; tns run android
scripts.deploy-android-vanilla: echo "Deploying Android Vanilla..."; npm run configure-vanilla; cd demo; tns run android
scripts.deploy-ios-angular: echo "Deploying iOS Angular..."; npm run configure-angular; cd ng-demo; tns run ios
scripts.deploy-ios-vanilla: echo "Deploying iOS Vanilla..."; npm run configure-vanilla; cd demo; tns run ios
scripts.webpack-vanilla: echo "Webpacking Vanilla..."; npm run configure; cd demo; npm run webpack-ios; npm run webpack-android; cd ..;
scripts.webpack-angular: echo "Webpacking Angular..."; npm run configure; cd ng-demo; npm run webpack-ios; npm run webpack-android; cd ..;
